column2: ggplot(combinedBAI_data, aes(x = Year, y = std, color = Dataset, linetype = Dataset)) +
geom_line(size = 0.5) +  # Default line size for dataset lines
geom_line(data = AllBAIchrn, aes(x = Year, y = std), color = "black", size = 1) +  # Thicker black line
theme(legend.title = element_blank())  # Optionally remove legend title
